Name Description Authors 🖧 🏡 👓 ⏬ Coding Language License OS Pricing Model
afmformats Python library for reading common AFM file formats Paul Müller 🌐 Python MIT 🐧 ❖ ⌘
AutoSmarTrace For automated tracing of chains in AFM images or any bright chain-like objects on dark background with or without noise. Mathew Schneider, Naghmeh Rezaei, Nancy Forde MatLab
Gwyddion David Nečas and Petr Klapetek C GPL 🐧 ❖ ⌘
nanite Fitting and machine-learning based rating of AFM force-indentation data Paul Müller 🌐 Python GPL 🐧 ❖ ⌘
PyJibe GUI for AFM data analysis with an emphasis on biological specimens Paul Müller Python GPL 🐧 ❖ ⌘
SmarTrace Chain tracing program developed to extract persistence lengths from AFM images of filaments such as collagen and DNA. Can be used on any type of image with bright chain-like structures on a darker background. Naghmeh Rezaei, Nancy Forde MatLab
TopoStats An AFM image analysis program to batch process data by removing artefacts, identifying objects, and obtaining and plotting their statistics. TopoStats Developers 🌐 🌐 🌐 Python LGPL 🐧 ❖ ⌘
Trace_y Tracing filament polymers and individual filament 3D structural analysis algorithms. Wei-Feng Xue Matlab MIT ❖ ⌘
